dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Miller of West Virginia (for herself and Ms. Sewell) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to extend Medicare-dependent hospital and Medicare low-volume hospital payments.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Assistance for Rural Community Hospitals Act of 2022 or the ARCH Act of 2022.

section.header: Extending Medicare-dependent hospital and Medicare low-volume hospital payments

paragraph.text: Section 1886(d)(5)(G) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395ww(d)(5)(G)) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in clause (i), by striking October 1, 2022 and inserting October 1, 2027; and
in clause (ii)(II), by striking October 1, 2022 and inserting October 1, 2027.
Section 1886(b)(3)(D) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395ww(b)(3)(D)) is amended—

clause.text: in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking October 1, 2022 and inserting October 1, 2027; and
in clause (iv), by striking 2022 and inserting 2027.

subparagraph.text: Section 13501(e)(2) of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1993 (42 U.S.C. 1395ww note) is amended by striking 2022 and inserting 2027.

subsection.text: Section 1886(d)(12) of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395ww(d)(12)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (B), in the matter preceding clause (i), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028;

subparagraph.text: in the matter preceding subclause (I), by striking 2022 and inserting 2027;
in subclause (III), by striking 2022 and inserting 2027; and
in subclause (IV), by striking 2023 and inserting 2028; and

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (D), by striking 2022 each place it appears and inserting 2027 in each such place.
